title: TVS MSP430 ( 80 coloumn printer)
summary: MSP430 is a 24 wire 80columnprinter for printing letter-quality reports, receipts,invoicesand bills. Its vertical-positioning feature with optional verticalstand,provides better print line visibility.Faster Printing speed of 360 CPSCopy Capability up to 1+ 3Input Buffer: 100 KBPrint head life : 200 Million Characters @ 33% Print density in 25% Duty CycleLong lasting 10 million Characters Ink Bank Ribbon for low running costs
